thread.title: Cinnamon Swirl French Toast sandwich is a knockout
thread.title_full: Cinnamon Swirl French Toast sandwich is a knockout - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: Cinnamon Swirl French Toast sandwich is a knockout
text:
Photo: Carl's Jr. Image 1 of / 5 5 Cinnamon Swirl French Toast Breakfast Sandwich﻿
Photo: Carl's Jr. Cinnamon Swirl French Toast Breakfast Sandwich﻿ Image 2 of 5 Fighter Ronda Rousey pitches for the Cinnamon Swirl French Toast Breakfast Sandwich at Carl's Jr. and Hardee's.
Photo: Matthew Stockman, Staff Fighter Ronda Rousey pitches for the Cinnamon Swirl French Toast... Image 3 of 5 Fighter Ronda Rousey pitches for the Cinnamon Swirl French Toast Breakfast Sandwich at Carl's Jr. and Hardee's.
Photo: Jae C. Hong, STF Fighter Ronda Rousey pitches for the Cinnamon Swirl French Toast... Image 4 of 5 Fighter Ronda Rousey pitches for the Cinnamon Swirl French Toast Breakfast Sandwich at Carl's Jr. and Hardee's.
Photo: Jae C. Hong, STF Fighter Ronda Rousey pitches for the Cinnamon Swirl French Toast... Image 5 of 5 FILE - In this Dec. 28, 2013, file photo, Ronda Rousey, left, of Venice, Calif., punches Miesha Tate of Yakima, Wash., during the UFC 168 mixed martial arts women's bantamweight title fight in Las Vegas. Rousey's star power grows with each month, and the UFC's dominant bantamweight champion could have held her next title defense anywhere. She chose to travel to Bethe Correia's native Brazil for UFC 190 on Saturday, Aug. 1, just so she can embarrass the challenger in front of her home fans. (AP Photo/David Becker, File)
Photo: David Becker, FRE FILE - In this Dec. 28, 2013, file photo, Ronda Rousey, left, of... Cinnamon Swirl French Toast sandwich is a knockout 1 / 5 Back to Gallery This week, I reached out for a new Cinnamon Swirl French Toast Breakfast Sandwich at Carl's Jr. and Hardee's, the sister burger chains with 3,600 restaurants between 'em.
With apologies to Bill Maher … Old Rule: If a menu item has more than four words in its name, I'll pass. But this time, I'll let Carl's Jr./Hardee's put words in my mouth. What's not to like? Cinnamon - crave it. French Toast? My fave breakfast. Sandwich? Put two in the bag and I'll be on my way.
Here's the Cinnamon Swirl French Toast Breakfast Sandwich breakdown: a folded scrambled egg, your choice of meat (ham, bacon or sausage), American cheese and maple-flavored glaze between two slices of French toast.
Total calories: 580 (with sausage). Fat grams: 34. Sodium: 1,110 mg. Carbs: 58 g. Dietary fiber: 1. Protein: 20 g.
Manufacturer's suggested retail price: $2.99.
I know, this sandwich sounds an awful lot like McDonald's pretty darn good morning McGriddle, which uses toasted maple flavored-infused waffles as housing units for the egg-cheese-sausage trinity.
The Cinnamon Swirl French Toast Breakfast Sandwich is new, but is it an improvement over the McGriddle? I'll answer that question with another question: Are you a waffle person or a French toast fan?
For me, it's an easy one: I heart French toast. Carl's Jr./Hardee's take on French toast doesn't match taking thick slices of challah, dipping them in cinnamon-laced egg batter and cooking them in a frying pan on your kitchen stove. But the flavor notes of eggy dip and cinnamon are there.
While the maple flavor is factory-installed in the McGriddle waffles, Carl's Jr./Hardee's slathers a rich, super-sweet maple paste on its Cinnamon Swirl French Toast Breakfast Sandwich. Edge to Carl's Jr./Hardee's. The maple flavor jumps off this sandwich in leaps and bounds. You get sweet maple, spicy cinnamon and salty sausage - it's a potent triple crown of taste.
Both the Cinnamon Swirl French Toast Breakfast Sandwich and the McGriddle come with a folded scrambled egg from a pre-packaged mix. But at McDonald's you can order off the menu and get a fresh-cracked fried egg on your McGriddle. Point, McDonald's.
But here's the clincher for Carl's Jr./Hardee's. Their breakfast sandwich is simply larger. And you know our mantra in the drive-through: Less is not more … more is more. We like bigger for our buck.
Cinnamon Swirl French Toast's real headline, though, is its talk-of-the-town TV commercial. Sure, it stars a curvy bikini model biting sensuously into the sandwich, but that isn't your typical Paris Hilton-Kim Kardashian-Kate Upton hottie.
That's mixed martial arts superstar Ronda Rousey. And she's wearing a push-up sports bra. Like the other spokeswomen, Rousey is a knockout - with her perfect 12-0 record as a pro fighter.
How convincing is Rousey as a product endorser?
Put it this way. It takes longer for you to eat a Cinnamon Swirl French Toast Breakfast Sandwich than for Rousey to make her opponent cry uncle in a UFC ring. That makes her incredibly credible.
